abstract.para: The Common Configuration Enumeration (CCE) list provides unique identifiers to security-related system configuration issues in order to improve workflow by facilitating fast and accurate correlation of configuration data across multiple information sources and tools.

line-item.name: CCE-14011-1
line-item.description: /var/log should be configured on an appropriate filesystem partition.

line-item.name: CCE-14023-6
line-item.description: The screen lock (password protection) function of the gnome desktop screensaver should be enabled or disabled as appropriate as a mandatory setting for all users.

line-item.name: CCE-14027-7
line-item.description: Disable or enable support for RDS as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14054-1
line-item.description: Zeroconf networking should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14061-6
line-item.description: The SSH 'keep alive' message count should be set to an appropriate value.

line-item.name: CCE-14071-5
line-item.description: NIS file inclusions should be set appropriately in the /etc/shadow file

line-item.name: CCE-14088-9
line-item.description: The 'wheel' group should exist or not as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-14089-7
line-item.description: Support for cramfs filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14093-9
line-item.description: Support for hfsplus filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14113-5
line-item.description: The minimum number of digits required for new passwords should be set as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14118-4
line-item.description: Support for squashfs filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14122-6
line-item.description: The minimum number of special characters required for new passwords should be set as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14132-5
line-item.description: Disable or enable support for SCTP as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14161-4
line-item.description: /tmp should be configured on an appropriate filesystem partition.

line-item.name: CCE-14171-3
line-item.description: /var/log/audit should be configured on an appropriate filesystem partition.

line-item.name: CCE-14268-7
line-item.description: Disable or enable support for DCCP as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14340-4
line-item.description: Files with the setuid attribute enabled should be reviewed as appropriate to determine whether that condition is correct.

line-item.name: CCE-14457-6
line-item.description: Support for freevxfs filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14466-7
line-item.description: The at daemon should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14559-9
line-item.description: /home should be configured on an appropriate filesystem partition.

line-item.name: CCE-14604-3
line-item.description: The gnome desktop screensaver should be enabled or disabled as appropriate as a mandatory setting for all users.

line-item.name: CCE-14675-3
line-item.description: NIS file inclusions should be set appropriately in the /etc/group file

line-item.name: CCE-14712-4
line-item.description: The minimum number of lower case characters required for new passwords should be set as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14735-5
line-item.description: The screen blanking function of the gnome desktop screensaver should be enabled or disabled as appropriate as a mandatory setting for all users.

line-item.name: CCE-14777-7
line-item.description: /var should be configured on an appropriate filesystem partition.

line-item.name: CCE-14794-2
line-item.description: All world-writable directories should be owned by an appropriate user.

line-item.name: CCE-14825-4
line-item.description: The isdn4k-utils package should installed or uninstalled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14853-6
line-item.description: Support for jffs2 filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14871-8
line-item.description: Support for udf filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14911-2
line-item.description: Disable or enable support for TIPC as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-14939-3
line-item.description: The "password reuse" policy should meet minimum requirements.

line-item.name: CCE-14970-8
line-item.description: Files with the setgid attribute enabled should be reviewed as appropriate to determine whether that condition is correct.

line-item.name: CCE-15047-4
line-item.description: Access to the root account via su should be restricted to the wheel group or not as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-15087-0
line-item.description: Support for hfs filesystems should be enabeld or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-18156-0
line-item.description: The rawdevices service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-18244-4
line-item.description: The irda service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3276-3
line-item.description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate user.

line-item.name: CCE-3315-9
line-item.description: The allowed period of inactivity gnome desktop lockout should be configured correctly.

line-item.name: CCE-3399-3
line-item.description: The sticky bit should be set or not set as appropriate for all world-writable directories.

line-item.name: CCE-3412-4
line-item.description: The firstboot service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3416-5
line-item.description: The rhnsd service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3425-6
line-item.description: The kdump service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3455-3
line-item.description: The smartd service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3485-0
line-item.description: Logins through the specified virtual console device should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3495-9
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate group.

line-item.name: CCE-3522-0
line-item.description: The nodev option should be enabled or disabled as appropriate for all removable media.

line-item.name: CCE-3535-2
line-item.description: The rpcgssd service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3562-6
line-item.description: Automatic loading of the IPv6 kernel module should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3566-7
line-item.description: File permissions for /etc/passwd should be set correctly.

line-item.name: CCE-3573-3
line-item.description: All files should be owned by a group as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3578-2
line-item.description: The named service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3622-8
line-item.description: The NIS update daemon should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3624-4
line-item.description: The SELinux policy should be set appropriately.

line-item.name: CCE-3650-9
line-item.description: The metaed service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3660-8
line-item.description: Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3662-4
line-item.description: The WBEM services should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3668-1
line-item.description: The mcstrans service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3689-7
line-item.description: The idle time-out value for the default /bin/tcsh shell should meet the minimum requirements.

line-item.name: CCE-3701-0
line-item.description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate group.

line-item.name: CCE-3705-1
line-item.description: The ypbind service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3707-7
line-item.description: The idle time-out value for the default /bin/bash shell should meet the minimum requirements.

line-item.name: CCE-3755-6
line-item.description: CUPS service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3818-2
line-item.description: The grub boot loader should have password protection enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3847-1
line-item.description: The dovecot service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3854-7
line-item.description: The mdmonitor service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3857-0
line-item.description: NFS server functionality should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3883-6
line-item.description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate group.

line-item.name: CCE-3910-7
line-item.description: The vlock package should be installed or not as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3918-0
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

line-item.name: CCE-3919-8
line-item.description: The vsftpd service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-3923-0
line-item.description: File permissions for /etc/grub.conf should be set correctly.

line-item.name: CCE-3950-3
line-item.description: The local rpc port mapping service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3958-6
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate user.

line-item.name: CCE-3967-7
line-item.description: File permissions for /etc/group should be set correctly.

line-item.name: CCE-3977-6
line-item.description: SELinux should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3987-5
line-item.description: Login access to non-root system accounts should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-3988-3
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

line-item.name: CCE-3999-0
line-item.description: The SELinux state should be set appropriately.

line-item.name: CCE-4009-7
line-item.description: Anonymous root logins are enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-4042-8
line-item.description: The nosuid option should be enabled or disabled as appropriate for all removable media.

line-item.name: CCE-4051-9
line-item.description: The cpuspeed service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-4060-0
line-item.description: The system login banner text should be set correctly.

line-item.name: CCE-4072-5
line-item.description: The autofs service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-4074-1
line-item.description: X Windows System Listening for remote connections should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-4075-8
line-item.description: Kernel level auditing for administrative actions should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.name: CCE-4092-3
line-item.description: The "maximum password age" policy should meet minimum requirements.

line-item.name: CCE-4097-2
line-item.description: The password warn age should be set appropriately

line-item.name: CCE-4100-4
line-item.description: The pcscd service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.name: CCE-4112-9
line-item.description: The cups service should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.

line-item.description: ExecShield should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.description: Kernel support for the XD/NX processor feature should be enabled or disabled as appropriate

line-item.description: The "minimum password age" policy should meet minimum requirements.

line-item.description: The USB device support module should be loaded or not as appropriate
